SELECT b.id AS beneficiary_id, b.name, b.gender, DATE_FORMAT(b.birthdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthdate, b.phone, b.address,
CASE WHEN b.status = 1 THEN '서비스 중' ELSE '서비스 해지' END AS status,
mcl.level AS care_level, bcl.end_date AS care_level_end_date,
CASE WHEN IFNULL(rsum.risk_total, 0) < 10 THEN '저위험' WHEN IFNULL(rsum.risk_total, 0) < 15 THEN '중위험' ELSE '고위험' END AS risk_level,
e.name AS manager_name, mst.name AS service_type,
g.name AS guardian_name, g.relation AS guardian_relation, g.phone AS guardian_phone,
mcl.monthly_limit,
/* ✅ 사용액 = (서비스: cost_of_beneficiary 이번달) + (렌탈: 이번달 기준 유지/계약중) */ ( IFNULL(( SELECT cob.monthly_amount FROM cost_of_beneficiary cob WHERE cob.beneficiary_id = b.id AND cob.month = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') ), 0) + IFNULL(( SELECT SUM(cp.rental_amount) FROM rental_contract rc JOIN contract_status cs ON cs.id = rc.contract_status_cd JOIN rental_product rp ON rp.rental_contract_cd = rc.id JOIN care_product cp ON cp.id = rp.product_id WHERE rc.beneficiary_id = b.id AND cs.name IN ('유지', '계약중') AND rc.start_date <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE()) AND ( rc.end_date IS NULL OR rc.end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') ) ), 0) ) AS used_amount,
/* ✅ 잔액 */ ( mcl.monthly_limit - ( IFNULL(( SELECT cob.monthly_amount FROM cost_of_beneficiary cob WHERE cob.beneficiary_id = b.id AND cob.month = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') ), 0) + IFNULL(( SELECT SUM(cp.rental_amount) FROM rental_contract rc JOIN contract_status cs ON cs.id = rc.contract_status_cd JOIN rental_product rp ON rp.rental_contract_cd = rc.id JOIN care_product cp ON cp.id = rp.product_id WHERE rc.beneficiary_id = b.id AND cs.name IN ('유지', '계약중') AND rc.start_date <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE()) AND ( rc.end_date IS NULL OR rc.end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') ) ), 0) ) ) AS remaining_amount,
/* ✅ 사용률 */ ROUND( ( ( IFNULL(( SELECT cob.monthly_amount FROM cost_of_beneficiary cob WHERE cob.beneficiary_id = b.id AND cob.month = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') ), 0) + IFNULL(( SELECT SUM(cp.rental_amount) FROM rental_contract rc JOIN contract_status cs ON cs.id = rc.contract_status_cd JOIN rental_product rp ON rp.rental_contract_cd = rc.id JOIN care_product cp ON cp.id = rp.product_id WHERE rc.beneficiary_id = b.id AND cs.name IN ('유지', '계약중') AND rc.start_date <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE()) AND ( rc.end_date IS NULL OR rc.end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') ) ), 0) ) / NULLIF(mcl.monthly_limit, 0) ) * 100 , 1) AS used_rate
FROM beneficiary b
LEFT JOIN beneficiary_care_level bcl ON bcl.beneficiary_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN beneficiary_count bc ON bc.beneficiary_care_level_id = bcl.id
LEFT JOIN m_care_level mcl ON mcl.id = bc.m_care_level_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rom.beneficiary_id, SUM(rf.score) AS risk_total FROM riskOfMember rom JOIN m_risk_factor rf ON rf.id = rom.risk_id GROUP BY rom.beneficiary_id ) rsum ON rsum.beneficiary_id = b.id
LEFT JOIN matching mt ON mt.beneficiary_id = b.id AND mt.status = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN care_worker cw ON cw.id = mt.care_worker_id
LEFT JOIN employee e ON e.id = cw.employee_id
LEFT JOIN guardian g ON g.beneficiary_id = b.id AND g.is_primary = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN m_service_type mst ON mst.id = ( SELECT bs.service_type_id FROM beneficiary_schedule bs WHERE bs.beneficiary_id = b.id ORDER BY bs.start_time ASC LIMIT 1 )
WHERE b.id = #{beneficiaryId} LIMIT 1
SELECT pt.tag FROM tag_of_beneficiary tob JOIN personal_tag pt ON pt.id = tob.tag_id WHERE tob.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} ORDER BY pt.id
SELECT rf.id, rf.name, rf.score FROM riskOfMember rom JOIN m_risk_factor rf ON rf.id = rom.risk_id WHERE rom.beneficiary_id = #{beneficiaryId} ORDER BY rf.id
